headline: MicroStrategy’s Saylor Hints at Bitcoin Acquisition Surpassing $1.25 Billion
summary: Michael Saylor hints at new Bitcoin purchase surpassing previous massive buy.

headline: Rieder's Star Is Rising as Possible Fed Pick: Bloomberg
summary: The candidacy of senior BlackRock executive Rick Rieder to be President Trump's pick as next Federal Reserve chair is gaining traction, according to Bloomberg. Rieder had an interview with Trump on Thursday and it went well, the report said, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline: Retirement plan sponsors slow-walk private asset adoption, new report finds
summary: According to a new report from consulting firm Cerulli Associates, a small number of employer-provided retirement plans are rolling out offerings with private asset options this year. But it will be roughly a decade before even 20% do so.

headline: Hassett says Trump may be right to pass him over for Fed chair
summary: “From the beginning, he and I have talked about whether it’s better for me to be here in the West Wing or over at the Fed,” Hassett said on Fox News’ .  Trump expressed reluctance last week about nominating Hassett as the successor to current Fed Chair Jerome Powell, telling the National Economic Council director during a White House event that “I actually want to keep you where you are, if you want to know the truth.”
